revised_title: Experiments on Substances Resisting Putrefaction and Means of Hastening and Promoting It
tldr: The author conducts experiments on substances that resist putrefaction and explores the means of hastening and promoting it. The study examines the effectiveness of various antiseptic substances, such as decoctions, infusions, and solutions, in preserving animal tissues and humors from putrefaction. The author also discusses the role of astringency and the potential use of antiseptic substances in treating various medical conditions.
